user_question: How can I improve my public speaking skills and generate an image of a confident speaker on stage?
final_answer: To improve public speaking skills: 1) Practice regularly in front of a mirror or with friends. 2) Record and review your speeches. 3) Join a public speaking club like Toastmasters. 4) Focus on clear articulation and pacing. 5) Use body language effectively. Image of a confident speaker on stage generated. Recommended online courses: 1) 'Introduction to Public Speaking' on Coursera. 2) 'Public Speaking Mastery' on Udemy. 3) 'Dynamic Public Speaking' on edX.
